title: Two regions, two cruves part - c

content.question: Without using absolute value, set up an expression involving one or more integrals that gives the volume of the solid generated by revolving the region R 1 about the line <math> <mrow> <mi> y </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mn> 5 </mn> </mrow> </math> . Do not evaluate.

frqParts.text: Without using absolute value, set up an expression involving one or more integrals that gives the volume of the solid generated by revolving the region R 1 about the line <math> <mrow> <mi> y </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mn> 5 </mn> </mrow> </math> . Do not evaluate.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
